about_the_game:
It’s 2040.



You are an intern at a prominent company that specializes in brain pattern technology and VR.
Digital Horizons.
Today is the big day! Digital Horizon’s tech has allowed people across the globe transfer their senses into the digital world.
Sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste…
Today, history will be made. Your brain patterns will be inserted directly into a test server.



No hardware required. No buffers. No body.
Today is just a four-day test… In and out!

You hate tests.



That didn’t happen though.
You ended up in the world wide web.
More specific, you ended up in the Twatch Servers, where the streamers stream to the world.






A person’s perspective can change the world directly. Even self-image can drastically change your appearance.
And somehow, they overlap effortlessly in a storm of chaos.

Now that you are here. What will you do?

content_descriptors.notes:
Can use Twitch TOS Mode or Uncut Mode
Adult situations: 
1. Romance and Implied Sexuality
2. Lewd Jokes
3. Cringe Fan Fics or overly Lewd Written Materials
4. Descriptive Violence and pain in first person POV
5. Mom Jokes (Maybe)
6. ASMR Tax Evasions (Worst one IMHO)

detailed_description:
Help Improve our Game!

Voice Act one of the NPC's with Credits.

Beta Testing Sections of the game.

Game Design Suggestions

You can take an active part in development! How many games offer that?


Feature List

  • Male or Female Routes with Non-Binary options
  • 8 Dateable Characters (4 Male, 4 Female)
  • Every Decision Matters
  • Fully Voiced
  • Collectable Fan Art Gallery (With Credits and Links)
  • Modular VN Systems for easy Modding
  • Color Themes Player Controlled
  • Voice and Audio Player controlled
  • 2D and 3D Compatibility
  • Live 2D Animation With Lip Sync, Expressions, and Eye Tracking
  • Animated Backgrounds


Casting



All the Vtubers in this project are streamers in the Real World that you can watch on Twitch, or YouTube. They voice their own parts and are an integral part of the way the story for their Dating Routes play out.

You can play as male or female as you progress through each route.

Lore that is connected to them makes their "Domain" and becomes their world for you to explore! You have one too!




Using their own models, and their own lore, some Vtubers have decided to contribute a part of their lore, voice acting, and art to the project to add life to the world. Use Onigiri's Market for a cooking date, or go to Amayaa's "Sinner's Paradise" to get some romantic advice, the choices are up to you!



Voiced by fans, and community members of the Vtubers in the game, these amazing people add voices to the different people that populate the world. Shop owners, college students, rogue AI, random beekeepers, you get the idea.


Make your own Visual Novel



B1NARY's mechanics and code are modular and designed to be reusable.

Writer Controlled Focus:
Writers can control backgrounds, scenes, characters, audio, text, themes, all from ONE script platform.

Most modularity is designed around consistent, game object-based implementation. This is meant to make things easier for people that know Unity to be able to jump right in.


  • Made in Unity
  • MIT Licensed Code
  • Github Version Public Code (When Wiki is finished)
  • 2D / 3D Character Support
  • Controller Support

World of B1NARY will be public and open source to allow others to make their own stories inside of the B1NARY world (Individual Vtubers own their IP. You cannot use their likeness without written consent.)

It’s 2040.



You are an intern at a prominent company that specializes in brain pattern technology and VR.

Today is the big day! Digital Horizon’s tech has allowed people across the globe transfer their senses into the digital world.
Sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste…
Today, history will be made. Your brain patterns will be inserted directly into a test server.



No hardware required. No buffers. No body.

That didn’t happen though.

legal_notice:
Incoming Legal EULA will be ready for the demo.
IP of the cast is protected by the law.
IP of the cast, cameos, and support are in game with permission of their owners.
Content in game will be approved by the cast, cameos, and support roles before it is released for the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: B1NARY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: It's 2040, and you have successfully transferred your consciousness into the internet... Now what? Maybe date some Vtubers? Things get complicated the deeper you dive. This isn't your parent's internet, that is for sure!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
